document.full_text: the artist ai weiwei was allowed a visit from his wife, the first time he has been seen or heard from since being detained 43 days ago by chinese authorities.
document.title: china allows dissident artist's wife to visit him
lines_and_colors: the artist ai weiwei was allowed a visit from his wife, the first time he has been seen or heard from since being detained 43 days ago by chinese authorities.
